title: In-Workplace Learning Strategy Design Simulation for Professional Chefs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced practical cooking experience and basic mathematical application skills
context.additional_context: Constructs a simulation environment mirroring the learning conditions faced by working professional chefs, delivering education reflecting real workplace scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical problems occurring during cooking tasks (e.g., ingredient ratio calculations, cost analysis) with 85% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Learners can identify at least three workplace learning barriers (e.g., time constraints, resource limitations) based on interview data and propose solutions for each
Learners can apply effective knowledge-sharing strategies in simulated team collaboration scenarios to improve peer learning rates by 40%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
